name: Life Evolver
description:
Left click and drag - draw live cells.
Right click and drag - create rectangular zones.

Implemented rules:

  • Any dead cell with 3 or 7 alive neighbors rises from the dead;
  • Any cell alive with 1, 2, or 3 neighbors survives;
  • All other live cells die in the next generation;

Zone rules:

 The LongLife ruleset is implemented in the zones. Cells live from generation to generation if they have 5 neighbors and are born if they have 3, 4, or 5 neighbors.
